name: SPIRIT (itch) (Miracle_Koyka)
description:
SPIRIT is a small puzzle, where you play as a girl named Gwen, who tries to defeat a Spirit, following her every move. SPIRIT was originally made for trijam, but i ran out of time, and decided to upload it as a non-jam game. It was made in 5 hours.

Controls: WASD - to move

Credits: Art and Coding was done by Miracle_Koyka in Construct 3, Librepsrite and SAI2. All music was made with AIVA. All sounds were taken from freesound.org and edited in Audacity.
